DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the proportion of patients which present a high cardiovascular risk estimated by the SCORE scale, in general practice consultations of the 7 French regions (Paris area, North-East, Paris basin, West, South-West, South- East, Mediterranean area)
DOC.brief_title: Cardiovascular Risk in General Practice in France: Cardiovascular Risk Week
DOC.criteria: Without any personal history of coronary disease Non treated with lipidlowering agents Lipid test = 1 year old Presenting at least one cardiovascular risk Visiting their General Practitioner
